interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/09 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: This is a beautiful skin product, formulated with classical ingredients for an effective scrub, including Glycolic Acid and Vitamin E, both of which are essential for a good skin product.

The product is clear, scent-free, and works effectively to exfoliate the face without being too harsh or harmful.
I like the fun packaging, the free sticker, and the included sample for other products by Higher Education: This definitely makes me want to purchase more products, because the company goes the extra mile with their packaging and extras.

I have quite sensitive skin and this is the second Higher Education Product I've used, and both have been positive experiences. I recommend them without hesitation. Review Title: A high quality skin product that really works! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381035006'} Love this product and its unique packaging! It also came with an awesome sticker and a sample for another Higher Education Product, super impressive and fun. I love the unique packaging that looks like a book!

The clay mask itself is good quality, and dried without excessive tightening or drying. It washed off easily and definitely gave a clearer complexion. The instructions do advise to only use on t-zone if you have drier skin seasonally.

Overall, great product and I will use it weekly! Fun and Functional Clay Mask Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Cute little hair ties for the toddlers and kids in your life with thin, slippery hair! I always use this style and found this brand to be comparable to the major brand I was previously using. The stretch is good and the packet is massive, and comes with a resealable zipper pocket for each style (black and multicolour). Solid Hair ties for your Toddlers! Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} This is a beautiful skin product, formulated with classical ingredients for an effective scrub, including Glycolic Acid and Vitamin E, both of which are essential for a good skin product.

The product is clear, scent-free, and works effectively to exfoliate the face without being too harsh or harmful.
I like the fun packaging, the free sticker, and the included sample for other products by Higher Education: This definitely makes me want to purchase more products, because the company goes the extra mile with their packaging and extras.

I have quite sensitive skin and this is the second Higher Education Product I've used, and both have been positive experiences. I recommend them without hesitation. A high quality skin product that really works!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Skincare Product Preference:** Prefers skincare products that offer immediate benefits, such as enhanced texture and clarity, highlighting a commitment to improving skin quality.
- **Quality Expectations:** Values high-quality formulations that are gentle and effective, avoiding those that excessively dry the skin.
- **Unique Packaging:** Enjoys innovative and engaging packaging, favoring products with creative or functional designs.
- **Experience Enhancements:** Appreciates additional perks in the purchasing process, such as complimentary samples and fun extras like stickers, which enhance overall user experience.
- **Usage Frequency:** Likely to integrate products into a consistent skincare routine, as indicated by the regular weekly usage of masks and scrubs.
- **Skin Sensitivity Awareness:** Demonstrates awareness of skin sensitivity and tailors usage according to individual skin needs for a personalized skincare regimen.
- **Additional Product Interests:** Recently shown interest in practical grooming products, such as hair accessories that are functional for specific hair types (like thin or slippery hair) and value durable, reusable items with convenient storage options.

The latest interaction reinforces the user’s commitment to effective skincare solutions that merge quality, thoughtful design, and sensitivity considerations, while maintaining the appreciation for enjoyable purchasing experiences and value-added features from brands.
